value.string: General Steps to Utilize and Train the Model

This section will go over the basic machine learning algorithms. Machine Learning (ML) is a subfield of AI, which focuses on studying the methods that can be used to improve the performance of a model over time.
General Steps to Utilize and Train the Model
Split the dataset into training and testing sets.
In this exercise, we are using the
The algorithm tries to find the best way to split the data at each step based on the features. It looks for the splits that maximize the separation based on a feature. The best split is decided by
, which is a metric used for information gain.
A low entropy value indicates that the data in that split is homogeneous, which is desired in a classification task.
A subset of AI that focuses on algorithms that allow computers to learn from data.
A subset of Machine Learning that utilizes artificial neural networks with multiple layers.
A predictive model that takes in the input vectors and outputs a predictive value.
Learning an input-output mapping based on labeled data.
Learning patterns from data without labeled outputs.
The act of using data to find the best model.

A simple neural network approximates the function using multiple neurons:
is the number of neurons (hidden units),
is the activation function applied to each neuron,
is the loss function for a single data point. This iterative update gradually optimizes the model parameters.
Layer: is a collection of neurons(nodes) that process data at a particular stage in the network. Consists of Input Layer, Hidden Layer, and Output Layer.
This class serves as an abstract base class for all layers in the network.
